content: lion brand pattern # 50580-c *claudiasclutch pdf* corrections applied aug 31 2005 skill level beginner level 1 lion® suede article #210 *discontinued* 122 yards trellis® article #500 *discontinued* 115 yards *ed note try combining a bulky yarn with a fancy glitter yarn for contrast that works up to the gauge you prefer * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm 1 large decorative button worked in single_crochet u s with 1 strand each of 2 yarns held together throughout for a special added touch line the purse with velvet or satin pdf download provides directions for both crochet and knit versions see also claudia s clutch knit 1 *free registration at site required to access pattern * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/claudias-clutch-knit
